title: Pulp Fiction
summary: A darkly comedic crime drama that intertwines multiple storylines involving gangsters, hitmen, and an enigmatic briefcase.

title: Forrest Gump
summary: A heartfelt story of an extraordinary man who witnesses and influences some of the defining moments of the 20th century.

title: Inception
summary: A mind-bending thriller about a thief who infiltrates dreams to steal secrets, but faces challenges in his quest for redemption.

title: Fight Club
summary: A provocative drama about an insomniac and a soap salesman who form an underground fight club that evolves into something dangerous.

title: The Matrix
summary: A hacker discovers the world is a simulated reality and joins a rebellion to free humanity from its digital confines.

title: The Godfather
summary: An epic tale of a powerful mafia family and the struggles of its reluctant heir to carry on its legacy.

title: The Lion King
summary: An animated coming-of-age story about a lion prince who must reclaim his throne after tragedy and betrayal.

title: The Dark Knight
summary: A gritty superhero film about Batman's battle against the anarchic Joker, testing his morality and resolve.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
summary: The first chapter of a grand fantasy epic, where a fellowship sets out to destroy a powerful ring and save Middle-earth.
